comment.body:
I'm a bit new to zeronet.  I just finished NoFish "ZeroChat tutorial (new)".  I was able to modify it with tipue into a simple search engine.  I found your site from a link from https://zero.acelewis.com/.  I read your explanation of how the site grabs new links.  I was thinking about how I would do it.  Could you pull the site visitors have on their local machines, and use that to make an index?  When you look at the start page it list them with then number of updates.

My example site is at.
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CBoYyapthhSJfhCcYs5RX8yfFacwkPYU5
